find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)
# Add as "system headers" to avoid warnings generated by them with
# compilers that support that notion.
include_directories(SYSTEM ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})

find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
find_package(VTK COMPONENTS vtkRenderingOpenGL REQUIRED)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR} ${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS})
set_property(DIRECTORY APPEND PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS ${VTK_DEFINITIONS})

set(HEADERS
  vtkAvogadroActor.h
)

set(SOURCES
  vtkAvogadroActor.cxx
)

avogadro_add_library(AvogadroVtk ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(AvogadroVtk
  vtkRenderingOpenGL)
